name: css-grid-cards
description: CSS Grid Cards: Speaker for TLP Tenerife 2018 / JSDay CanariasJS 2018

scripts.build: rm -rf build && parcel build src/index.pug --out-dir build/ --public-url ./
scripts.dev: parcel serve src/index.pug && parcel watch src/index.pug
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf dist && rm -rf .cache && rm -rf build

author: Manz
